title: Washington Debrief: CHIME Reacts to MU Final Rules
text:
14 Washington Debrief: CHIME Reacts to MU Final Rules 
Healthcare Informatics: Key Takeway: Last week, the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services (CMS) released a final rule impacting the meaningful use program. The rule combined modifications to the current reporting years—2015-2017—as well as Stage 3 criteria. Simultaneously, regulations were issued for the 2015 Edition of Certified EHRs.
